price: Gökten uygun bir ölçüde bir su indirdik ve onu yerde tuttuk. Biz onu gidermeye de elbet kâdiriz.
arabic: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَسۡكَنَّٰهُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابِۭ بِهِۦ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-askannāhu fī al-arḍi wa-innā ʿalā dhahābin bihi laqādirūna
translations: then We cause it to settle
